title: Angelina Jolie Looks Unrecognizable in New Blond Look

Yahoo is using AI to generate takeaways from this article. This means the info may not always match what's in the article. Reporting mistakes helps us improve the experience. Generate Key Takeaways

Angelina Jolie sure knows how to make heads turn! The Hollywood star looks almost unrecognizable as she stunned with a new hair transformation on the set of her upcoming movie, Anxious People. Jolie is filming alongside Aimee Lou Wood and Jason Segel, for which she has debuted a stunning new blonde look.

Angelina Jolie debuts blond look for new movie

Angelina Jolie is currently filming her upcoming movie, Anxious People, an adaptation of Fredrik Backman’s novel of the same name. On September 3, E! News photographed the Oscar-winning actress on the set in London, sporting a stylish new blonde look.

For the role, she ditched her trademark long brunette hair for a trendy blonde bob cut. Jolie shared a candid moment with her son Maddox as she walked through the set. She was dressed in a simple ensemble featuring a cream-colored shawl and a matching midi-wrap dress. The actor paired the look with a silk scarf and white heels.

However, Angelina Jolie elevated her simple ensemble by sporting her signature red lipstick and red nail polish. The actor, known to be a doting and loving mother, often takes her children to work or events. The Salt star has single-handedly taken responsibility for her six children after a much-publicised divorce from her ex-husband and Hollywood star Brad Pitt.

Anxious People is a film about a bank robber who holds a bunch of residents of an apartment open house hostage. The novel explores how a diverse group of strangers deal with the anxiety and stress of being held hostage.

The premise is scary, but the narrative uses wit and humor as the strangers find company and solace in one another. The book explores themes of urban loneliness, human connection, and mental health.

The post Angelina Jolie Looks Unrecognizable in New Blond Look appeared first on Reality Tea.
summary: Angelina Jolie has debuted a new blonde look on the set of her upcoming movie, Anxious People, which is an adaptation of Fredrik Backman’s novel of the same name. The Oscar-winning actress ditched her trademark long brunette hair for a trendy blonde bob cut. She is currently filming alongside Aimee Lou Wood and Jason Segel.
